description.title: Stand up a basic local network with default configuration (bootstrapped)
description.purpose: Runs a test against the Nightwatch environment to start two Corda nodes, load the Finance DorDapp, then transfer 50 USD from PartyA node to PartyB node, and 25 USD from PartyB node to PartyA node. The test uses the pre-compiled Finance RPC client. Verification is performed by requesting each node to print out their cash balance.
